item.title: Raichur Court Sentences Two in Sexual Assault Case
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: The Third Additional District and Sessions POCSO Court in Sindhanur has sentenced two individuals in a case involving the sexual assault of a minor girl, reported in April 2018 under the Sindhanur Town Police Station limits.
The court sentenced Ramesh, son of Mariyappa (Accused No. 1), to 10 years of rigorous imprisonment and imposed a fine of Rs 15,000. Ramesh, son of Mudiyappa (Accused No. 2), received two years of simple imprisonment along with a fine of Rs 5,000. Both accused are r...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author

item.title: IIIT Raichur Cutoff 2024: Check category-Wise JEE Main Cutoff Ranks
item.description: <![CDATA[IIIT Raichur BTech Cutoff 2024 was released on the basis of candidates' performance in the JEE Main exams. The courses offered by the institute were BTech in Computer Science and Engineering, BTech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science and BTech in Mathematics and Computing. The cutoff was released for reserved and unreserved categories under the All India quota. For the General All India quota candidates, the cutoff ranks during the last round closed between 52125 and 63164. BTech in Comp...]]>
item.author: Shoaib Mehdi, Atul Mishra
